coreAttributes.name: thigh high boot
coreAttributes.description: A pair of thigh-high boots, with the heel being raised off the ground in order to make the wearer taller, as well as to accentuate their calf muscles and the overall length of their legs.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the boots and [npc.verb(pull)] them up to [npc.her] mid-thigh.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the boots and [npc.verb(pull)] them up to [npc2.her] mid-thigh.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the boots and [npc.verb(yank)] them up to [npc2.her] mid-thigh.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the tops of [npc.her] thigh-high boots before tugging them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the tops of [npc2.namePos] thigh-high boots before tugging them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] down the tops of [npc2.namePos] thigh-high boots before tugging them off.
